Posts.Content: I started Tykerb in December 07 and will take it for a year. At first had severe bowel probs but my body got used to the med quickly. You do not want to eat food within an hour of taking this med! I also have a rash that started about two months into taking drug. Other than that, it is the easiest of all of my treatment so far. Good luck to you. Keep looking up!
Posts.Title: suppose to begin with tykerb in a month or so..

Posts.Content: Hi K. What would you like to know about Herceptin? It is the mildest treatment I have been given. The primary concern is the heart. I am sure your onc will monitor you closely. My chemo nurses tell me that Herc is the wonder drug for her2 cancer. I hope and pray you will do well. Please write anytime you want to talk. You will be in my prayers! Dee
Posts.Title: herceptin

Posts.Content: Jackie, How are you doing now that there has been a few days to absorb it all? I was diagnosed her 2 pos 3+ in July of 07. I am still undergoing trt. My love and support go out to you and your family. Have you spoken with your doctor yet? I am thinking of you and praying. Please don't put off asking for more information/explanations of your doctor. I understand the fear and stress of all of this, but you have to step up and become your own advocate. Knowledge is power in this cancer war. I have four children at home and understand every emotion you must be feeling right now. God Bless you..and remember to keep looking up!!! Please stay in touch if you want. Dee
Posts.Title: Stage IV liver mets, HER2+, ER/PR -, facing surgery post chemo

Posts.Content: Jackie, Hope today was a good one for you. As the weather turns colder, try to do a lot of things you really enjoy. It is easy to get down about everything when the skies are gray! You are in my prayers. Hang in there sister! Hugs of Hope, Dee

Posts.Content: Will  my hair return to how it was before chemo? It is a slightly different color now (2 months post) with  a lot of white hairs and much thinner.
Posts.Title: hair regrowth after chemo
